title: True Food Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is centered on the principals of Dr. Andrew Weil's Anti-Inflammatory Diet & Food Pyramid, with several ovo/lacto vegetarian dishes and a few vegan ones, marked. The organic tomato & roasted vegetable pizza is made without cheese. Spacious and modern.
